在面對聯賽前六名的對手時，曼聯在已賽的 4 個作客中竟然一球未進，這是全英超 20 支球隊的最差成績單，要知道利物浦在面對前六對手的 5 個作客里攻入 9 球，即便是降班的米杜士堡，也在面對前六隊伍的 4 個已賽作客裡進了 2 球。

另外，曼聯在這 4 場裡的射正次數，加起來只有 11 次，進攻確實存在問題。

加歷查說：「 這個賽季作客面對前六隊伍，曼聯一球未進，這不正常。對於曼聯，考慮到他們的主教練、場上的球員、他們花的錢，在這些比賽中進不了球，實在令人尷尬。」

加歷查分析稱，主要原因是摩連奴的戰術。

「 這源自摩連奴，他的戰術設定。摩連奴這個人，任何比賽只要他感覺是五五開，或者對手稍佔上風，他的第一個想法都是去限制對手，讓比賽踢不出東西來。他們最擅長的？就是殺死比賽內容。」

前曼聯球星加利尼維利認為，摩連奴確實有類似的比賽「 程式 」。

「 我想他是有一套類似程序，來幫他度過這些強強對話的，但這個賽季，曼聯在英超中的表現是令人無法接受的。」

「 當摩帥的陣容對比對手處於下風時，他會試圖完全的抵消對手，從歷史上說，我預期的曼聯即使打作客重頭戲，10 到 15 年前，對阿仙奴、車路士、曼城，無論派上的是不是大衛碧咸、堅尼、史高斯和傑斯，都會是 4411 陣型，保持陣型緊密。」

尼維利指出，明年是真正檢驗摩帥的時候，畢竟今年他對曼聯的改造才剛開始。「 摩連奴只為曼聯簽了 4 球員，等他簽下 8 到 10 人後，等他再改造一年，如果他還是打六後衛陣型，我會提出問題來。」

「 如果你看看摩連奴執教生涯中的入球數，這個賽季絕對是怪異的另類，摩帥的球隊在入球方面總是第一或者第二的，今年則是個奇怪的例外，這可能是摩連奴最近執教 10 到 15 年以來最差的球隊表現了。」

相比起被「雪藏」的馬迪爾和狀態大跌的朗尼，上陣機會多不勝數的連加特，今季的表現更加讓人失望，畢竟這名英格蘭中場的週薪早被提升至10萬鎊，相信球會和球迷均期待此子貢獻更多，但曾被外借至李斯特城、伯明翰、白禮頓和打比郡的他，進步的速度顯然相當緩慢。

聯同社區盾的賽事，現年24歲的連加特今季已為曼聯出戰過38次，期間一共收獲5入球3助攻，表現似乎略為失色。

相比起被「雪藏」的馬迪爾和狀態大跌的朗尼，上陣機會多不勝數的連加特，今季的表現更加讓人失望，畢竟這名英格蘭中場的週薪早被提升至10萬鎊，相信球會和球迷均期待此子貢獻更多，但曾被外借至李斯特城、伯明翰、白禮頓和打比郡的他，進步的速度顯然相當緩慢。

09/05/2013 15:53,United appoint Moyes

• Manchester United Board unanimously approves the recommendation of Sir Alex Ferguson
• Moyes to take the helm on 1 July
• Committed to long-term in 6 year deal

NYSE:MANU, Manchester UK. David Moyes will take over as the Manager of Manchester United from the 2013/14 season.

David, 50, has been the Everton manager since 2002, joining after a successful spell as manager of Preston North End.

Announcing his successor, Sir Alex Ferguson said:

"When we discussed the candidates that we felt had the right attributes we unanimously agreed on David Moyes. David is a man of great integrity with a strong work ethic. I've admired his work for a long time and approached him as far back as 1998 to discuss the position of Assistant Manager here. He was a young man then at the start of his career and has since gone on to do a magnificent job at Everton. There is no question he has all the qualities we expect of a manager at this Club.”

Sir Bobby Charlton said:

“I have always said that we wanted the next manager to be a genuine Manchester United man. In David Moyes, we have someone who understands the things that make this such a special club. We have secured a man who is committed to the long-term and will build teams for the future as well as now. Stability breeds success.

“David has tremendous strength of character and recognises the importance of bringing young players through and developing them alongside world class talent. At United, I think David will be able to express himself. I’m delighted he has accepted and I’m looking forward to working with him.”

Ed Woodward, said:

“In David Moyes, we have secured the services of an outstanding manager who has all the skills to build on the phenomenal legacy in place today. I have no doubt that he will bring an energy and commitment to deliver winning football that is part of the fabric of this Club. In this respect, he is cut from the same cloth as the Old Trafford greats who go before him.

“I have been very impressed by David’s personal and managerial traits, which reflect the Manchester United values. I have no doubt that he will embrace, and soon become an integral part of, United’s unique culture and heritage.”

Joel Glazer said:

“I am very pleased David has agreed to lead Manchester United into the future. His hard working style and steely determination are characteristics we value at the Club. He has impressed as a coach for many years now and we strongly believe he will be able to take up from where Alex is leaving off by continuing this Club’s tradition of flair football played by exciting, world class players.”

Avie Glazer said:

“The search for a new manager has been very short. Alex was very clear with his recommendation and we are delighted that David has agreed to accept the job. He comes to us with excellent credentials and a strong track record. I know he is keen to get started and Ed will be sitting down with him as soon as the season is over to discuss plans for the summer and beyond."



David Gill said:

“I’m delighted that David has agreed to join Manchester United. He has done a terrific job at Everton and has all the qualities that we are looking for in a manager to succeed Alex.”

David Moyes said:

“It’s a great honour to be asked to be the next Manager of Manchester United. I am delighted that Sir Alex saw fit to recommend me for the job. I have great respect for everything he has done and for the Football Club.

“I know how hard it will be to follow the best manager ever, but the opportunity to manage Manchester United isn’t something that comes around very often and I’m really looking forward to taking up the post next season.

“I have had a terrific job at Everton, with a tremendous chairman and Board of Directors and a great set of players. Between now and the end of the season, I will do everything in my power to make sure we finish as high as possible in the table.

“Everton’s fantastic fans have played a big part in making my years at Goodison so enjoyable and I thank them wholeheartedly for the support they have given me and the players. Everton will be close to me for the rest of my life.”

David will be introduced to the world as the Manager of Manchester United in due course.

伊巴謙莫域在加盟曼聯後成為了英超收入最高的球員，他的週薪高達36萬7640英鎊，年薪已經超過了1900萬英鎊。除此之外，伊巴謙莫域還可以獲得共計286萬英鎊的入球獎金。也就是說，今季瑞典人的合約內收入已經達到了2186萬英鎊之多！換算成週薪就是42萬英鎊/每週！這個數字已經比美斯和C.朗拿度的薪水都高了，在全世界範圍內也僅次於加盟中超的泰維斯。


　　合約中同樣註明，伊巴謙莫域在今季聯賽中只有正選出戰31場以上，他的合約才會自動延長。而今季，由於膝蓋受傷，賽季報銷的伊巴謙莫域的正選次數已經定格在了27場。


　　但這一條款無疑是簽約之初，曼聯方面介於伊巴謙莫域較高的年齡所採取的保險措施。今季伊巴謙莫域表現優異，是曼聯隊內的頭號得分手。因此，只要伊巴謙莫域願意，續約基本不成問題。根據《足球解密》透露的合約細節，瑞典人與曼聯就歐冠盃聯賽成績方面也有相當詳盡的條款：若下個賽季球隊進入歐冠盃8強，伊巴謙莫域可獲得的獎金金額為50萬英鎊，進入4強為125萬英鎊，進入決賽為275萬英鎊，贏得歐冠盃則能獲得525萬英鎊的高額獎金！當然，這一切都要以伊巴謙莫域續約並且曼聯能夠獲得明年的歐冠盃資格為前提。

A new book published in Germany, ‘Football Leaks: The Dirty Business of Football’, which is out this week, claims that Pogba earns a basic wage of £8.61m along with a £3.4m loyalty bonus for every year he stays at Old Trafford.

United last night distanced themselves from the claims of the investigation as it was reported that FIFA have written to United “to seek clarification on the deal”.

A United spokesman said: “We don’t comment on contracts. FIFA have had the documents since the transfer in August.” United’s position is that they carried out the deal with Juventus according to the regulations and would have expected to have heard before now had the authorities been unhappy with any aspect of the transaction.”

It is understood FIFA have asked United to explain the detail of the Pogba transfer and that the investigation will focus on claims that Raiola struck a deal with Juve for a 50 per cent slice of any future transfer over £40m – which could breach regulations over third-party ownership

【now.com體育】日前國際足協宣布會徹查保羅普巴轉會曼聯一案，調查曼聯與普巴的經理人之間的金錢流動。有英國傳媒指，曼聯最終或只需繳交罰款了事。

據英國《鏡報》報道，國際足協已透過一個監察球會跨境交易系統TMS，去調查曼聯與保羅普巴（Paul Pogba）的經理人拉奧拿（Rino Raiola）之間的交易。由於拉奧拿被傳媒披露在是次交易中獲益4千多萬，包括2300萬的轉會費，以及確保普巴成功履行5年合同的獎金，故此國際足協決定調查，研究交易文件中是否讓經理人得到應有的獲益。 

國際足協的發言人並沒有透露調查細節，只是表明已向兩間球會取得交易資料，而報道更稱，若國際足協最終確認交易中違規，或提供錯誤資訊，曼聯或祖雲達斯將會被罰，最高刑罰將會是罰款11,750英鎊

【now.com體育】最後一次在卡達朗球場上演的馬德里打吡，當然敵意濃，兩軍名將基斯坦奴朗拿度與費蘭度托利斯就在球場上進行罵戰。

話說基斯坦奴朗拿度（Cristiano Ronaldo）在比賽中與費蘭度托利斯發生磨擦，雙方唸唸有詞，需要由球證隔開，而《馬卡報》繪形繪聲報道兩人的對罵內容。

「有甚麼不妥？」費托問：「小丑！」C朗當然不會示弱，回應說：「返歸吧，白癡！」之後兩人被分開，據報帶笑離開的C朗不忘再向費托爆粗。

據報今次衝突的源頭，在於當皇馬入球後，C朗豎起手指向馬體會球迷，意謂叫他們收口，因而惹怒費托。皇馬兩回合計以4:2擊敗宿敵，C朗顯然是笑到最後的一位。

據報今次衝突的源頭，在於當皇馬入球後，C朗豎起手指向馬體會球迷，意謂叫他們收口，因而惹怒費托。皇馬兩回合計以4:2擊敗宿敵，C朗顯然是笑到最後的一位。

盛傳今夏必脫「魔」的曼聯隊長朗尼，在周四歐霸盃和切爾達交鋒前，透露自己想延續奧脫福的球員生涯。
朗尼（Wayne Rooney）今季在摩連奴麾下地位大不如前，失去常規正選，而今年2月，其經理人曾飛往中國，和中超球會商討加盟事宜，後來卻叫停，而朗尼也發出聲明，表示自己現刻會留隊，但沒有透露未來計畫。 外界認為朗尼最遲都會在今夏走人，但他在周四歐霸盃4強次回合對切爾達前，雖不滿自己今季上陣機會不多，但聲稱沒有意思離隊：「我已經在這間球會13年，當然想要在這裡繼續踢球。」 縱使伊巴謙莫域上月提早收咧，但朗尼仍在曼聯上陣時間不穩定，上周的首回合，便全場坐在後備席。他用了比喻來回應自己目前的心態：「我沒有把我的玩具從嬰兒車拿出來，但我還想要繼續玩，這代表我想幫助球隊。足球世界不斷在改變，你在職業生涯會遇上不同的挑戰，我想要取得更多比賽時間，但不管是在場內或場外，我都會盡力幫助球隊。」

The 19-year-old has had a poor spell in Germany so far, whilst the report suggests that Bayern Munich could let Sanches depart if they receive an offer of around €35 million.

That money will then be used to fund a move for Schalke’s Leon Goretzka.

We know that Jose Mourinho was interested in signing Sanches before he signed for Bayern Munich.
